block.p: Jennifer Lynn Shepard, the daughter of Faith L. Shepard and Neal F. Shepard Jr. of King of Prussia, Pa., was married last evening to Michael Christian Dovey, a son of Terri A. Duval of Alta Loma, Calif., and John D. Dovey of El Dorado Hills, Calif. The Rev. Mark D. W. Edington, an Episcopal priest, performed the ceremony at the Memorial Church of Harvard in Cambridge, Mass.
The bride, 31, and bridegroom, 26, met while attending the genetics program at Harvard, from which she received a doctorate and where he is a doctoral candidate.

Jennifer Lynn Shepard, the daughter of Faith L. Shepard and Neal F. Shepard Jr. of King of Prussia, Pa., was married last evening to Michael Christian Dovey, a son of Terri A. Duval of Alta Loma, Calif., and John D. Dovey of El Dorado Hills, Calif. The Rev. Mark D. W. Edington, an Episcopal priest, performed the ceremony at the Memorial Church of Harvard in Cambridge, Mass.

Jennifer Lynn Shepard, the daughter of Faith L. Shepard and Neal F. Shepard Jr. of King of Prussia, Pa., was married last evening to Michael Christian Dovey, a son of Terri A. Duval of Alta Loma, Calif., and John D. Dovey of El Dorado Hills, Calif. The Rev. Mark D. W. Edington, an Episcopal priest, performed the ceremony at the Memorial Church of Harvard in Cambridge, Mass.
The bride, 31, and bridegroom, 26, met while attending the genetics program at Harvard, from which she received a doctorate and where he is a doctoral candidate.

Dr. Dovey is a postdoctoral research fellow at the Center for Cancer Research at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology in Cambridge, where she studies the role of stem cells in lung cancer. She graduated magna cum laude from Princeton.
Mr. Dovey graduated cum laude from Occidental College. He is a stepson of Lisa Dovey and of Jeffrey Duval.
